COMMENT_TX: replay,5,samaj001,CHN,hirsj901,PIT08,,N,M,CHN,C $Cubs manager Rick Renteria challenged the call at 1B in his first game as Cubs skipper; the ruling was upheld; this was the first use of the expanded replay system
